There is already a version released with a size of 4,5 GByte.

But due to the complaints I released the full DVD, so everyone can shrink it or burn it on a DVD9.

The problem with "Der Untergang" is, that the picture quality in the original version is not the best, so every additional compression makes it always worse.

Danish and English subs can be downloaded at the mentioned links above. There's also a link which describes how to add subs.
